synopsis.text: The tale unfolds on the celestial island of Atlantis, where a young girl, Luna, finds herself held captive. Enter Cyan, a determined boy who embarks on a daring rescue mission to free Luna from her confines. However, their journey is fraught with challenges, including an enigmatic adversary and the significant role played by a robot named Gekiga-go. This anime promises a thrilling adventure filled with suspense and surprise.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
